mapper.select: select count(*) from artist join edit_artist ea on ea.artist=artist.id where artist.gid = #{gid};
SELECT count(*) AS recording_count FROM recording JOIN artist_credit_name acn ON recording.artist_credit = acn.artist_credit JOIN artist on acn.artist = artist.id WHERE artist.gid = #{gid};
SELECT count(*) AS release_count FROM release JOIN artist_credit_name acn ON release.artist_credit = acn.artist_credit JOIN artist on acn.artist = artist.id WHERE artist.gid = #{gid};

select (x.end - x.start) as active_years from (select min(re.date_year) as start, max(re.date_year) as end from release JOIN artist_credit_name acn ON release.artist_credit = acn.artist_credit JOIN artist on acn.artist = artist.id JOIN release_event re on re.release = release.id where artist.gid = #{gid} and re.date_year is not NULL) x;

select count(distinct acn1.artist) from artist_credit_name as acn join artist as ar on acn.artist = ar.id join artist_credit_name as acn1 on acn.artist_credit = acn1.artist_credit join artist as ar1 on ar1.id = acn1. artist where ar.gid = #{gid} and ar1.gid != #{gid};
select count(*) from artist join edit_artist ea on ea.artist=artist.id where artist.gid = #{gid};
